title: Tutorial Campaign System
description: 14 interactive tutorials across 4 categories (Basics, Editing, Creative, Output) accessible from Info > Tutorials. Each campaign walks through a specific feature area with spotlight highlights and Clippy mascot. Completion tracking persisted across sessions.

title: Source Monitor
description: Double-click a video or image in the Media Panel to preview the raw source file in a dedicated preview window.

title: NativeDecoder Auto-Upgrade & JPEG Compression
description: All video clips automatically upgrade to NativeDecoder when the helper connects. Frame transfers compressed from 8MB to ~150KB via JPEG encoding. Includes frame pre-buffering for smooth playback and recursive file locate for late-loaded clips.

title: Custom Slot View with Manual Assignment
description: Slot grid now uses manual assignment only via media drop and context menu. Slots show thumbnail previews with time overlays, per-layer vertical opacity sliders, and clean compact UI with hidden toolbar/composition tabs.

title: Scrubbing & Seeking Improvements
description: Hybrid seeking with fastSeek for instant feedback + deferred precise seek. Improved smoothness with exact-frame seeking, per-time cache, and RVFC bypass. Canvas-first video path until GPU decoder is active. Lazy GPU surface warmup after reload.

title: Scrub audio stability fixes
description: Fix multiple audio race conditions: AudioContext close killing pending decodeAudioData, onended from old source clobbering new source, stuck AudioContext after refresh. Retry with cooldown instead of permanent failure.

title: Slot Grid multi-layer playback fixes
description: Fix layer-isolated slot architecture with independent playheads per slot. Fix deactivated comp still rendering in preview, editor slot promotion bug, background layer restart, slot time overlay cross-layer interference, and slot playhead jump on comp switch.

title: Layer opacity rendering fixes
description: Fix single-layer opacity black screen, layer opacity flickering from cached stale merged layers, opacity slider not triggering re-render, and nested comp wrapper for primary layer opacity.

title: Engine idle detection stability
description: Suppress idle until first play instead of time-based grace period. Fix engine going idle before video GPU warmup completes after reload.

title: GPU texture memory leak fix
description: Reuse textures for NativeDecoder frames instead of creating new ones. Canvas fallback for video frames not yet presented to GPU.

title: Test coverage expansion (517 â†’ 1679 tests)
description: Added comprehensive tests across 20 test files: clipSlice, maskSlice, compositionSlice, fileManageSlice, exportUtils, AI tools, effects registry, serialization, and more.

title: Output Manager Slice System with Corner Pin Warp
description: Full slice system for output targets with corner pin warping, inline rename, mask layers, drag-drop reordering, and auto-save/load of configurations.

title: Output Manager with RenderTarget Routing
description: New Output Manager UI with per-target source routing, unified RenderTarget system, independent render scheduling, and window restore on close.

title: Output window stability fixes
description: Fix tab jumping on refresh, window geometry persistence, drag activation, and reconnection issues for output windows.

title: Fix scrubbing and slice rendering issues
description: Fix scrubbing showing nothing after page reload, WGSL uniformity errors in slice shader, and black screen when sliced targets share active composition.

title: Resolume-style slot grid with multi-layer playback
description: New slot grid view with click-to-play, drag reorder, live playhead, row labels, column headers, and multi-layer composition playback with independent wall-clock time per layer.

title: Tutorial system with Clippy mascot
description: Spotlight-based tutorial mode with panel introduction, timeline deep-dive, Clippy mascot with intro/outro animations, welcome screen with program selection, and skip button.

title: Multi-platform video download support
description: Download videos from TikTok, Instagram, Twitter/X and more. YouTube panel renamed to Download panel with platform-specific subfolders.

title: Unified native-helper and platform cleanup
description: Removed old platform-specific helpers and finalized the unified cross-platform native-helper.

title: Preview updates on tab switch
description: Request render on tab switch so the preview updates without needing to play.

title: Fix loading clip Y-axis offset
description: Fixed loading clip offset caused by a global .loading CSS class conflict.

title: Slot grid zoom transition and view toggle
description: Ctrl+Shift+Scroll collapses the timeline into a slot grid with a semantic zoom-out transition.

title: SAM 2 AI Segmentation
description: AI-powered video segmentation with model download, inference worker, panel UI, and preview overlay for interactive object selection.

title: GPU-accelerated Video Scopes
description: Professional video scopes with histogram, vectorscope, and waveform monitor in DaVinci Resolve style, fully GPU-accelerated with zero readPixels overhead.

title: Vitest test suite
description: Added 182 tests across unit and store layers for improved code quality and regression prevention.

title: Composition resolution drives render pipeline
description: Compositions now control render resolution directly, with native pixel scale for new clips and scale adjustment on resize.

title: Fix preview flickering after effect changes
description: Resolved preview flickering caused by thumbnail regeneration and random frame display after effect or clip changes.

title: Fix multiple effects not stacking
description: Fixed bind group cache returning stale texture views when multiple effects were applied.

title: Render loop watchdog and crash protection
description: Added watchdog to detect and recover from render loop crashes, preventing permanent preview freezes.

title: Fix solid clip persistence and trimming
description: Solid clips now persist across project save/load and can be trimmed beyond their initial duration, with live visual preview during trim.

title: Fix tutorial stuck after part transition
description: Fixed tutorial getting stuck when transitioning from Part 1 to Part 2.

title: Fix clip overlap and audio desync on move
description: Fixed clips overlapping and audio desyncing when moving clips on the same track.

title: Fix timeline duration edit not persisting
description: Timeline duration edit now properly syncs to the composition.

title: Menu reorganization
description: AI panels grouped as submenu, tutorials moved to Info menu, scopes moved to hover submenu in View menu, removed duplicate Preview Quality entry.

title: Timeline clip entrance animation
description: Clips now animate in with a staggered 20ms delay per clip and inherit label color from media files.

title: NativeHelper dialog improvements
description: Auto-check connection on dialog open, updated messaging to focus on YouTube downloading.

title: WIP bug badges on incomplete features
description: Added WIP bug badges to Edit Mode, AI Segment, Multi-Cam, and certain transform properties to indicate work-in-progress status.

title: Smooth composition switch transitions
description: 200ms crossfade on composition switch with per-track slide and fade animations.

title: Audio tracks always expanded by default
description: Audio tracks now always show the expand arrow and start expanded.

title: Label color column with sortable headers
description: Added proper label color column to media panel with sortable column headers.

title: Prevent clips dragged to wrong track types
description: Clips can no longer be accidentally dragged to incompatible track types in the preview.

title: Timeline clip dragging improvements
description: Added vertical distance resistance for track changes, free movement on same track, proper cross-track overlap prevention, and find-or-create track when target is full.

title: Keyframe copy/paste and graph improvements
description: Copy/paste keyframes with Ctrl+C/V, auto-scale Y-axis in graph editor, toggle off saves value and deletes keyframes, and keyframe tick marks on clip bars.

title: Timeline zoom and scroll improvements
description: Exponential zoom scaling, finer 8% zoom steps, vertical scroll snaps to track boundaries, and smooth track height resizing with reduced minimum from 30px to 20px.

title: Fix curve editor layout issues
description: Fixed curve editor overlapping property rows and scroll snap positions. Only one curve editor can be open at a time.

title: View toggles and settings
description: View toggles persist in project file, thumbnails and waveforms toggles work correctly, and checkboxes update visually.

title: Green video/audio separator and mask edge dragging
description: Visual separator between video and audio tracks with optimized mask drag performance.

title: Fix Ctrl+Z crash with undefined layers
description: Filter undefined layers in history snapshots to prevent crash on undo.

title: Compact Settings dialog with unified API keys
description: Consolidated all API keys into a compact settings dialog.

title: Updated default layout
description: Scopes and properties on right side, media on left. Multi-Cam removed from default layout with WIP panels grayed out.

title: Disable marquee and pick whip in timeline
description: Disabled lasso/marquee selection and pick whip parenting in timeline clips and tracks.

title: Fix parallel decode seeking
description: Fixed keyframe validation for seeking, CTS-based keyframe search, and back-seek not triggering when decoder passes the target frame.

title: Linked clip selection
description: Select linked audio/video clips together with independent Shift+click override. Properties panel shows the clicked clip immediately.

title: Rewritten proxy system with WebCodecs
description: Proxy generation rewritten to use WebCodecs decode with WebP frames and MP4 output. Supports resume from disk after interruption, parallel JPEG encoding, and fixes for DPB deadlock and slow start.

title: Instant media import and faster MOV loading
description: Media import is now instant with fast MOV duration extraction via MP4Box container parsing.

title: Fix undo/redo reliability
description: Flush pending captures, shallow equality checks, and batch safety improvements for reliable undo/redo.

title: Fix split clips sharing properties
description: Split clips are now fully independent with deep cloned properties.

title: Fix first-time save losing project data
description: First-time save no longer loses all project data.

title: Fix keyframe interaction issues
description: Clicking new keyframe no longer drags the previously selected one. Position and Rotation stopwatch now keyframes all axes.

title: Fix transparency grid rendering
description: Transparency checkerboard now renders in GPU shader with increased square size from 8px to 24px.

title: Blend mode cycling with German keyboard layout
description: Blend mode cycling works with direct key press on German keyboard layout.

title: Decouple playhead from clip re-renders
description: PlayheadPosition decoupled from TimelineClip props to prevent unnecessary re-renders during playback.

title: Fix loading clip visual appearance
description: Loading clips now show opaque background with centered content, proper border styling not overridden by proxy states.

title: Fix New Project not resetting state
description: New Project now properly resets state instead of saving current state.

title: Fix React hook ordering error
description: Moved useTimelineStore hook before early returns to fix React error #300.

title: Fix undo/redo history system
description: Fixed race conditions, missing state, and batch grouping issues in the undo/redo history system.

title: Solid color clips
description: Create solid color clips in the media panel with color picker, composition dimensions, and visual styling that fills the entire timeline bar.

title: After Effects-style Properties panel
description: Unnormalized values, compact transform panel with inline X/Y/Z, left-aligned labels with right-aligned values, AE-style color label column, and solid color picker inline.

title: After Effects visual redesign
description: Complete visual overhaul with darker color palette, updated typography, and refined proportions matching After Effects aesthetics.

title: Fix text layer live preview
description: Text layers now update live during property editing with proper font weight dropdown and composite cache clearing.

title: AE-style file type icons in Media Panel
description: Media panel shows file type icons instead of thumbnails, with folder expand disclosure triangles for a cleaner After Effects-style look.

title: Fix proxy generation issues
description: Fixed proxy decode loop, DPB deadlock on NVIDIA GPUs, slow start, and stuck at 100% issues.

title: Fix media panel persistence
description: Text items and solid items now persist across page reloads.

title: Fix audio detection for camera MOV files
description: Fixed audio detection for camera MOV files like Canon DK7A.

title: Panel resize handle improvements
description: Wider grab area for panel resize handles with only the dragged handle highlighted.

title: Fix instant clip placeholder on drop
description: Clips now show an instant placeholder on drop with loading indicator between tracks.

title: Inline simple effects in composite shader
description: Brightness, contrast, saturation, and invert effects are inlined in the composite shader, eliminating extra render passes.

title: Performance: lazy-load panels and bundle optimization
description: Lazy-loaded panels and split heavy dependencies reducing main chunk by 19%. Bundled timeline selectors from 29 to 6 subscriptions.

title: Fix memory leak and RAM preview cache
description: Added memory leak prevention and RAM preview cache limits.

title: Fix project rename error
description: Fixed project rename failing with 'Folder already exists' error by preventing double-call with error feedback.

title: Dev server mode without changelog dialog
description: Added dev server mode that skips the changelog dialog for faster development iteration.

title: React performance optimization
description: Optimized Zustand store subscriptions, split PropertiesPanel into lazy-loaded tabs, stabilized callbacks with useCallback, and reduced unnecessary re-renders across the app.

title: RenderLoop stability fixes
description: Fixed memory leak from RenderLoop being recreated on every play/pause, fixed playback hanging when engine was idle, and ensured the loop restarts correctly.

title: RAM Preview and proxy caching fixes
description: Fixed RAM Preview cache checks being skipped, added support for nested compositions in RAM Preview, and used WebCodecsPlayer for faster cache generation.

title: Proxy generation hanging at 103%
description: Fixed proxy generation getting stuck by clamping progress values and ensuring proper completion signaling.

title: Audio clip fades control volume instead of opacity
description: Audio clip fade handles now correctly adjust volume rather than opacity.

title: Draggable Settings dialog
description: Settings dialog can now be dragged and no longer shows a dark overlay blocking the background.

title: Changelog UI improvements
description: Added refactor category with icon, improved grid layout with expand/collapse animation and fixed two-column layout.

title: Transitions system with crossfade support
description: Added a modular Transitions Panel with drag-drop support and crossfade rendering between clips.

title: Redesigned Settings dialog
description: Settings now uses an After Effects-style sidebar navigation with a dedicated Transcription category.

title: Video Warmup (proxy frame preloading)
description: Added a cache/warmup button for manual proxy frame preloading with a yellow cache indicator on the timeline ruler.

title: Corner and edge handle scaling in edit mode
description: Added corner and edge handles for scaling layers directly on canvas, with Shift held for aspect ratio lock.

title: JKL keyboard shortcuts for playback
description: Added J/K/L playback control shortcuts with reverse playback support and automatic speed reset on pause.

title: Multi-select clip movement
description: Select and drag multiple clips at once with visual preview, collision detection, linked audio/video sync, and snapping support.

title: FCP XML export
description: Export your timeline as Final Cut Pro XML for interchange with other editing software.

title: Snapping and clip animation fixes
description: Fixed snapping not working when enabled without Alt key, and clip entrance animation now only triggers on composition switch.

title: Audio detection for OBS video formats
description: Fixed audio stream detection failing for OBS recordings and similar video formats.

title: Audio effect warnings in GPU pipeline
description: Suppressed spurious audio effect warnings that appeared in the GPU rendering pipeline.

title: Linux Vulkan warning banner
description: Added a banner warning Linux users to enable Vulkan for better performance.

title: Text items with drag-to-timeline support
description: Text items now appear in the Media Panel and can be dragged onto the timeline.

title: Export stability improvements
description: Fixed export crashes at time 0, VideoFrame garbage collection causing device loss, frame tolerance issues, and added HTMLVideoElement fallback for decode failures.

title: Nested composition rendering and export fixes
description: Fixed nested comp effects/keyframes not loading, transform/effects missing when paused, layer order issues, and opacity animations not applying during export.

title: Proxy and nested comp visibility fixes
description: Fixed proxy getting stuck at 100% and nested composition visibility issues.

title: Simplified keyframe UI for Scale and EQ
description: Scale keyframes now use a single X/Y toggle, and EQ keyframes use a single toggle for all bands.

title: Live EQ with Web Audio API
description: Added real-time equalizer support powered by the Web Audio API.

title: Audio tab for video clips
description: Video clips now have a dedicated Audio tab with improved volume keyframe UX and audio track overlap detection.

title: Audio playback fixes
description: Fixed audio volume out of range causing preview freeze, split clip audio for audio-only clips, and stopped spamming decode errors for videos without audio.

title: Mask display fixes
description: Fixed masks not showing when switching compositions or after page refresh.

title: Texture lifecycle and GPU conflict fixes
description: Fixed GPU conflicts by letting garbage collection handle texture cleanup instead of immediate destruction.

title: Effect parameter fallback values
description: Fixed effect parameters using incorrect fallback when value is 0 or empty string by switching from || to ?? operator.

title: GitHub commit links in changelog
description: Changelog entries now link directly to their GitHub commits.

title: Scrubbing and preview fixes
description: Fixed scrubbing being broken by seeking-cache checks, black preview on reload, video frame jumping during effect changes, and frame rate limiting now only applies during playback.

title: Effects bleeding through to layers below
description: Fixed a rendering bug where effects from one layer would visually bleed into layers underneath.

title: FPS stats accuracy and display
description: Fixed inflated FPS from multiple RAF loops, increased measurement frequency to 4x/second with per-frame precision, and added render time to the compact stats overlay.

title: Clip split playback fix
description: Fixed split clips not playing correctly by creating new video/audio elements on split.

title: GitHub link and Native Helper download URL
description: Added a GitHub link to the Info dialog and fixed the Native Helper download URL.

title: Bezier fade curves on timeline clips
description: Opacity fades now display real-time bezier curves directly on timeline clips, with preserved easing when adjusting fade duration.

title: WYSIWYG thumbnails with effects
description: Clip thumbnails now show applied effects, and nested composition thumbnails are content-aware showing clip boundaries.

title: Visual boundary markers for nested compositions
description: Nested composition clips now show visual boundary markers indicating where inner clips start and end.

title: Copy/paste for timeline clips
description: Use Ctrl+C/V to copy and paste clips on the timeline, with thumbnail/waveform reuse and undo support.

title: Track header scroll isolation
description: Disabled Shift+Wheel horizontal scroll and Alt+Wheel zoom when hovering over track headers to prevent accidental timeline changes.

title: Export decode and keyframe fixes
description: Fixed export decoding seeking to wrong keyframes and removed unreliable HTMLVideoElement fallback from export pipeline.

title: Nested composition UX improvements
description: Media Panel now activates when clicking composition tabs, and right-click on compositions opens the Media Panel with correct layer numbering.

title: Clip segments generated on project load
description: Fixed clip segments not being available after loading a project, which caused playback issues.

title: Code cleanup and ESLint config
description: Phase 1 code cleanup with ESLint configuration and refactor plan.

title: Shared Decoder Architecture V2 for exports
description: New hybrid export system with SharedDecoderPool, FrameCacheManager, ExportPlanner, and V2ExportBridge for more reliable and efficient video exports.

title: Backward seek and decode reliability
description: Fixed backward seek detection and decode batch logic in ParallelDecodeManager for accurate frame retrieval.

title: Linux/Vulkan black preview and GPU compatibility
description: Fixed black preview on Linux/Vulkan by using preferred canvas format, removing device limits, and adding proper texture creation delays.

title: Clip entrance animations on composition switch
description: Clips now animate in sequentially when switching compositions, with smooth CSS-based entrance animations.

title: IndexedDB corruption error dialog
description: Shows a helpful error dialog when browser storage is corrupted, guiding users to recover.

title: Nested clip state updates and missing files
description: Fixed nested clips not updating immutably when media loads, and handles missing files gracefully with a needsReload flag.

title: Project loading and auto-relink reliability
description: Improved project restore reliability with auto-relink from Raw folder, IndexedDB file handle fallback, and proper nested composition refresh.

title: Nested composition rendering and export
description: Fixed nested compositions not rendering in preview and export by correcting texture flags, source types, video seeking, and frame caching.

title: Blend mode not updating in realtime
description: Fixed blend mode changes not reflecting immediately in preview by clearing transform cache and properly invalidating layers.

title: Cut tool for timeline clips
description: Press C to toggle cut mode and click clips to split them. Cut indicator extends across linked video+audio clips, with snapping support.

title: Playhead and cut tool snapping
description: Fixed snapping to work without holding Alt key and playhead snapping to respect the snapping toggle.

title: Marker drag-to-create with ghost preview
description: Improved markers with drag-to-create, ghost marker preview, drop animations, and markers that extend into the time ruler.

title: Professional Logger service
description: Centralized logging with debug/info/warn/error levels, module filtering, search, and console commands. Migrated entire codebase from console.log.

title: Full project persistence
description: Encrypted API keys, global settings, per-project UI state (dock layout, timeline view), autosave enabled by default, and nested comp persistence.

title: Frame caching during playback for instant scrubbing
description: Frames are automatically cached during playback so scrubbing back is instant without re-decoding.

title: B-frame decoding and export frame accuracy
description: Fixed B-frame reordering, added frame buffering, half-frame tolerance for sample lookup, and proper keyframe tracking for accurate exports.

title: Changelog dialog redesign
description: Redesigned changelog with 2-column layout, grey version badge, transparent background, and removed known issues section.

title: Major codebase modularization
description: Split WebGPUEngine (57% smaller), FrameExporter (1510 to 8 files), clipSlice (66% reduction), Timeline hooks, projectFileService, and aiTools into focused modules.

title: Auto-copy imported media to project Raw folder
description: Imported media files are automatically copied to the project's Raw folder, with duplicate detection by name and size.

title: Batch updates, unique IDs, and blob URL manager
description: Added efficiency improvements including batch state updates, unique ID generation, and centralized blob URL management.

title: Timeline zoom/scroll reset on composition switch
description: Fixed timeline zoom and scroll position resetting when switching between compositions.

title: Auto-play on page reload removed
description: Fixed unwanted auto-play behavior when the page reloads or engine becomes ready.

title: Numpad +/- for blend mode cycling
description: Use numpad plus and minus keys to quickly cycle through blend modes on selected clips.

title: WebCodecsPlayer keyframe and decoder crashes
description: Fixed null decoder crashes, keyframe decoding issues, and needsKeyframe tracking after flush in WebCodecsPlayer.

title: Audio clip creation for videos without audio
description: Skip audio clip creation for videos without audio tracks and handle empty audio elements in nested compositions.

title: Linked audio preview when dragging video
description: Shows a preview of the linked audio track when dragging a video clip to a new track zone.

title: Remove VJ/Mixer mode completely
description: Removed the VJ/Mixer mode and dissolved the mixerStore for a cleaner codebase.

title: YouTube auto-place downloads in YouTube folder
description: YouTube downloads are now automatically placed in a dedicated YouTube folder in the media panel.

title: Work area overlay visual improvements
description: Extended work area overlay to top of ruler and increased transparency for better visibility.

title: Rename StatsTracker to avoid ad blockers
description: Renamed StatsTracker to PerformanceStats to prevent ad blockers from blocking the performance overlay.

title: Export startup speed improvement
description: Fixed slow export startup by only decoding 30 frames ahead instead of all frames, with lazy sample loading.

title: Remove platform performance warning
description: Removed the platform performance warning from the welcome overlay for a cleaner first-run experience.

title: NativeHelperDialog crash with lite helper
description: Fixed a crash in the NativeHelperDialog when using the lite helper variant.

title: Video thumbnail generation detection
description: Fixed video clip detection for thumbnail generation to work correctly with all clip types.

title: DragDurationCache typo in external drop
description: Fixed dragDurationCacheRef typo to dragMetadataCacheRef in useExternalDrop hook.

title: Parallel decode optimization for exports
description: Optimized parallel decoding with 60-frame buffer, batch decode, smart flush, and better synchronization for multi-layer exports.

title: Nested composition invalidation
description: Parent compositions are now properly invalidated when nested composition content changes.

title: Proxy scrubbing with larger cache
description: Optimized proxy scrubbing with a larger cache and smarter preloading for smoother timeline navigation.

title: Lite helper for Windows (YouTube only)
description: Added a lightweight native helper for Windows that supports YouTube downloads without requiring FFmpeg.

title: WebGPU device loss recovery and Vulkan OOM
description: Graceful handling of GPU device loss with automatic recovery, smaller initial textures, and guards against memory exhaustion.

title: YouTube format selection and quality options
description: Added format selection dialog, list_formats command, H.264 preference over AV1/VP9, persistent searches per project, and downloads saved to project YT folder.

title: Show GPU vendor in header
description: Displays the GPU vendor (Nvidia, AMD, Intel, etc.) in the application header for quick identification.

title: Export compatibility and error handling
description: Better error handling for WebGPU device loss during export, auto-fallback to PRECISE mode for unsupported codecs like AV1, and improved MOV error messages.

title: YouTube download transfer via WebSocket
description: Replaced file picker with WebSocket transfer for YouTube downloads, with optimized base64 decoding for large files.

title: Instant clip display with background thumbnails
description: Clips appear instantly on the timeline while thumbnails generate in the background.

title: WebGPU device recovery and HMR stability
description: Added WebGPU device recovery, cleared video cache on HMR, disabled React StrictMode for WebGPU compatibility.

title: YouTube download clips missing audio
description: Fixed YouTube download clips having no audio and white preview by creating proper audio tracks and using WebCodecs.

title: WebCodecs export freeze and decoder state
description: Fixed export freezing on first frame by properly handling flush(), keyframe requirements, and decoder readiness in WebCodecs export.

title: YouTube quality selection panel
description: Added quality selection for YouTube downloads with format options.

title: Mask editing performance
description: Throttled mask texture and vertex updates during drag operations for smoother editing, with proper texture regeneration on drag end.

title: macOS menubar app with tray icon
description: Added a macOS menubar app with tray icon and platform-specific download instructions for the native helper.

title: Node.js native helper for YouTube downloads
description: Added a Node.js-based native helper as an alternative for YouTube download support.

title: Parallel video decoding for multi-clip exports
description: Added parallel decoding support for regular and nested composition clips, enabling faster multi-clip exports with timestamp-based frame tracking.

title: Export mode selection (Fast vs Precise)
description: Choose between Fast (WebCodecs sequential) and Precise (HTMLVideo seeking) export modes. Fast mode uses dedicated WebCodecs players with MP4Box parsing.

title: Changelog dialog with time-based categories
description: Redesigned changelog dialog with fixed height and time-based category grouping.

title: Case-insensitive file extension detection
description: File extension detection is now case-insensitive for all container formats, preventing import issues with uppercase extensions.

title: Varispeed audio scrubbing
description: Audio scrubbing plays at variable speed like Premiere/Resolve, with audio master clock so playhead follows audio timing.

title: Layer caching for pause and scrubbing
description: Added layer caching to improve performance when paused or scrubbing through the timeline.

title: RAM Preview defensive checks
description: Added defensive checks for clip transform data in RAM Preview to prevent crashes.

title: Fast export with WebCodecs sequential decoding
description: Export uses dedicated MP4Box players and sequential decoding for significantly faster rendering. Improved H.264 codec configuration and frame synchronization.

title: Native Helper for hardware-accelerated codecs
description: Rust-based Native Helper application enables hardware-accelerated decoding of ProRes, DNxHD and other professional codecs via WebSocket. Includes auto-detection, status indicator, and download UI.

title: YouTube download via Native Helper + yt-dlp
description: Download YouTube videos directly into your project using the Native Helper and yt-dlp. Includes URL paste support, download button overlay, and multiple fallback APIs.

title: What's New dialog on startup
description: Shows latest changes after updates with a smooth fade-in/fade-out animation.

title: FFmpeg WASM export with professional codecs
description: Custom FFmpeg WASM build supports ProRes, DNxHD, and other professional codecs for export. Includes audio support, progress overlay, and frame-accurate seeking.

title: Relink dialog with multi-select and auto-open
description: Relink missing media files more easily with multi-file selection and automatic folder picker after single file relink.

title: Desktop mode option for mobile devices
description: Mobile users can now opt into desktop mode to access the full editor interface.

title: Turbo button styling and export progress
description: Turbo button is now icon-only with proper styling. Export progress bar weighting adjusted to 95% video / 5% audio.

title: Accept .mov and .mxf files in drag and drop
description: Professional video formats MOV and MXF are now accepted when importing via drag and drop.

title: Mobile UI with touch gestures and warning
description: Initial mobile UI support with touch gestures, visible menu buttons, and a warning overlay informing users about limited mobile functionality.

title: Keyframes saved and restored in project files
description: Keyframe data is now properly serialized and restored when saving and loading projects.

title: Proxy streaming decode for Windows NVIDIA GPUs
description: Fixed proxy generation compatibility with Windows NVIDIA GPUs by using streaming decode.

title: Relink dialog, Info menu, and media management
description: New Relink dialog to reconnect missing media files. Smart relink scans folders to auto-match files. Auto-reconnect to saved media source folder on project open.

title: FFmpeg WASM export with more format options
description: New FFmpeg-based export pipeline with support for additional professional codecs and format options.

title: Project file persistence and reload
description: File handles from drag-and-drop are persisted for reuse. Visual indicators for clips needing reload. Reload All button and Save As option added.

title: Store thumbnails and proxies in local project folder
description: Thumbnails and proxy frames are stored in the local project folder instead of IndexedDB. Uses file hashes for deduplication.

title: Version display and branding
description: App title updated to MASterSelects with custom favicon, social sharing preview, and version display with auto cache-busting.

title: Timeline navigation and scrollbar improvements
description: New custom vertical scrollbar, better zoom clamping, scrollbar handles follow mouse 1:1, and padding to see end marker when zoomed out.

title: Idle mode for GPU resource savings
description: Engine enters idle mode when nothing changes on screen, saving GPU resources. Stats overlay shows idle status.

title: Media Panel with columns and composition settings
description: Media Panel now shows FPS, Container, Codec, and Size columns. Draggable column reordering and resizable name column. Improved Composition Settings dialog.

title: Clip serialization and project restore
description: Fixed clip serialization for project save/restore. Auto-recreate default project if deleted. Show WelcomeOverlay when restore fails.

title: Composition sync and duration handling
description: Duration changes from Composition Settings now sync to timeline. Auto zoom out when opening compositions.

title: Pause playback when dragging playhead
description: Dragging the playhead now pauses playback automatically, matching the behavior of Premiere Pro and DaVinci Resolve.

title: Ctrl+S saves project instead of browser dialog
description: Ctrl+S now triggers project save instead of the browser's default save dialog.

title: Proxy worker error handling and pixel validation
description: Improved proxy worker robustness with better error handling and pixel validation to prevent corrupt frames.

title: Multi-preview with texture sharing
description: Multiple preview panels can now share GPU textures for nested compositions, with independent rendering and bidirectional playhead sync.

title: Text clips with typography controls
description: Add text clips to the timeline with full typography support and draggable font size control. Text, image, and color clips can now be extended infinitely.

title: Transparency grid toggle in preview
description: Toggle a checkerboard transparency grid per preview panel to see transparent areas in your composition.

title: Mask support for nested compositions
description: Masks now work correctly on clips inside nested compositions, with proper sync when switching between compositions.

title: Mask feather quality and blur improvements
description: Mask feather now uses CPU-based Canvas2D blur for smooth, high-quality results with a 10-step quality control.

title: GPU-accelerated proxy generation
description: Proxy frames are now generated on the GPU with batch processing, replacing the old software decoding pipeline.

title: H.264 WebCodecs decoding improvements
description: Fixed H.264 decoding with proper AVC description extraction, two-pass MP4Box parsing, and codec fallback for better compatibility.

title: Playback performance optimizations
description: Significant playback improvements: removed 30fps cap, reduced frame drops with high-frequency playhead updates, video decoder warm-up, and throttled preloading.

title: Smoother audio sync during playback
description: Audio drift correction is now gentler to avoid clicks and pops, with improved sync at playback start.

title: Bidirectional playhead sync for nested compositions
description: Playhead position now syncs bidirectionally between parent and nested composition timelines.

title: Proxy support for nested compositions
description: Clips inside nested compositions now support proxy playback for smoother editing of complex projects.

title: Extract Timeline hooks into separate modules
description: Timeline.tsx refactored into focused hooks: clip drag, clip trim, marquee selection, playhead drag, zoom, keyboard shortcuts, layer sync, and context menu.

title: Proxy fill indicator with percentage badge
description: Proxy generation progress is now shown as a fill-from-bottom badge with percentage instead of an hourglass icon.

title: Proxy generation with auto-save and GPU acceleration
description: Proxies auto-save to the project's Proxy/ folder. GPU-accelerated proxy frame generation with batch processing. Improved error handling and retry mechanism.

title: Autosave with backup system
description: Configurable autosave interval with saved toast notification. Keeps last 20 backups for safety. Accessible via flyout submenu in File menu.

title: Welcome overlay redesign
description: Modern minimal welcome overlay with entrance/exit animations, backdrop blur, and colored tagline. Auto-closes after folder selection.

title: Modular effects system with 30+ GPU effects
description: New modular GPU effects system with over 30 effects including color, blur, distort, stylize, and keying. Includes bypass toggle, draggable values, and quality parameters.

title: Multi-preview with texture sharing
description: Modular multi-preview system shares textures between previews for nested compositions. Tab shortcut toggles edit mode. Per-preview transparency grid toggle.

title: Transparency grid rendering
description: Transparency checkerboard now uses CSS rendering for consistent pixel size. Proper canvas background handling with dark grey surround.

title: Nested composition rendering and stability
description: Fixed flickering, texture format mismatches, and transparent backgrounds in nested compositions. Proper bidirectional playhead sync and cache invalidation.

title: Mask support for nested compositions
description: Masks now work on clips inside nested compositions. Improved mask feather with Gaussian blur, 10-step quality control, and real-time updates.

title: Playback performance optimization
description: Fixed 30fps cap, reduced frame drops with throttled preloading, high-frequency playhead updates bypassing React, and video decoder warm-up for faster first play.

title: Audio drift correction and sync
description: Gentler audio drift correction using playback rate adjustments to avoid clips and pops. Throttled sync prevents glitches.

title: Export stability for all layer types
description: Export now correctly renders nested compositions, text clips, and effects. Isolated export from preview rendering to prevent video conflicts.

title: WebCodecs H.264 decoding improvements
description: Proper AVC description (SPS/PPS) extraction, two-pass MP4Box parsing, and codec fallback for better H.264 decoding across platforms.

title: Text preview updates in real-time
description: Text clips now update in the preview immediately when editing while paused. Canvas textures are cached for performance.

title: Draggable font size for text clips
description: Font size can now be adjusted by dragging, and text/image/color clips can be extended infinitely.

title: WGSL uniform control flow errors
description: Fixed shader compilation errors in bulge and twirl effects caused by non-uniform control flow.

title: Drag and drop visual indicator for Media Panel
description: Improved visual feedback when dragging files into the Media Panel.

title: Timeline component modularization
description: Extracted 8 hooks and components from Timeline.tsx for better maintainability: keyboard, zoom, playhead drag, context menu, marquee selection, clip trim, clip drag, and layer sync.

title: Nested composition rendering and audio
description: Nested compositions now render properly with transforms, include audio mixdown with waveform display, and support speed changes on audio playback.

title: AI Video panel with PiAPI integration
description: Generate AI videos from images using multiple AI models (Kling, Runway, Luma) through PiAPI, with image cropping, balance display, and timeline integration.

title: Audio export pipeline
description: Export audio separately with configurable settings. Includes Opus codec fallback for Linux compatibility.

title: Keyframeable clip speed control
description: Clip playback speed is now a keyframeable property. Speed changes automatically adjust clip duration and audio pitch is preserved.

title: Layer parenting with physics cable animation
description: Parent layers to each other using After Effects-style pick whip for transform inheritance, with Reason-style physics cable animations.

title: Preview quality setting
description: Reduce preview resolution for better performance during editing. Choose from Full, Half, or Quarter resolution.

title: Timeline navigator with zoom handles
description: A minimap-style navigator at the bottom of the timeline with draggable zoom handles for quick navigation.

title: Drag and drop files from OS file explorer
description: Import media files by dragging them directly from your operating system's file explorer into the Media panel.

title: Video preloading for stutter-free playback
description: Upcoming video clips are preloaded to prevent stuttering during playback, with video readiness checks before starting.

title: Composition info and export panel cleanup
description: Composition resolution moved to Export panel with info tooltip. Removed confusing duplicate sections from the export interface.

title: Preview shows black when no clips at playhead
description: Preview now correctly displays black instead of stale frames when the playhead is over empty timeline space.

title: Restored clips work after page refresh
description: WebCodecsPlayer is now properly initialized for restored clips, and waveforms/thumbnails are correctly cropped when trimming.

title: Spacebar plays timeline when slider is focused
description: Spacebar now correctly triggers playback even when a UI slider has focus.

title: Playback audio sync improvements
description: Audio sync now only triggers on start and significant drift to prevent glitches, using requestAnimationFrame for smoother playback.

title: Text clips with full typography support
description: Add text clips to the timeline with customizable font, size, color, and alignment. Full typography rendering on the GPU canvas.

title: Nested composition rendering and transforms
description: Nested compositions now properly pre-render with transforms applied. Includes bidirectional playhead sync between parent and child compositions.

title: Nested composition audio mixdown
description: Audio from nested compositions is mixed down with waveform display. Supports speed changes and proper export. Opus codec fallback for Linux.

title: Drag and drop files from OS file explorer
description: Import media files by dragging them directly from the OS file explorer into the Media panel.

title: PiAPI multi-model AI video generation
description: Replaced Kling API with PiAPI for AI video generation. Supports multiple models with balance display and credit cost estimates.

title: Export panel with audio settings
description: Export panel redesigned with audio settings, Export Audio option, and cleaner layout with buttons at top.

title: Spacebar plays timeline when slider focused
description: Spacebar now correctly triggers timeline playback even when a UI slider has focus.

title: Premiere-style transcript with word highlighting
description: In-browser transcription using Whisper AI with word-level timestamps, real-time highlighting during playback, language selection, and persistent data across refreshes.

title: Clip analysis panel
description: Analyze clips for focus, motion, brightness, and face detection with real-time graphs, gradient coloring, cached results in IndexedDB, and cancel support.

title: AI Chat with timeline editing tools
description: Chat with GPT models to edit your timeline using natural language. AI can cut clips, analyze footage, manage media, and all edits are undoable with Ctrl+Z.

title: Multicam audio sync
description: Synchronize multiple camera angles automatically by analyzing audio cross-correlation, with transcript-based sync as an alternative option.

title: Bezier curve editor for keyframes
description: Edit keyframe animation curves with a visual bezier editor. Supports shift+drag horizontal snapping and right-click to reset handles.

title: Per-clip audio controls with 10-band EQ
description: Full audio panel with per-clip volume, 10-band equalizer, and keyframeable audio properties displayed in the timeline.

title: Keyframe editing improvements
description: Drag keyframes to move them, change easing via context menu, marquee-select keyframes, visual easing mode indicators, and right-click property values to reset to default.

title: Unified Properties Panel
description: Transform, Effects, Masks, Audio, Transcript, and Analysis consolidated into a single tabbed Properties panel with clip name in the title.

title: Multiple preview panels with composition selector
description: Open multiple preview panels side-by-side, each showing a different composition. Layout is saved and restored.

title: Position Z depth for 3D clip positioning
description: Clips now have a position Z property for depth-based layering and 3D-style positioning.

title: After Effects-style menu bar
description: Professional menu bar with File, Edit, View, and panel visibility toggles. Project name displayed at the left.

title: Dock panel reordering with tab indicators
description: Resolume-style slot indicators when dragging panels to reorder tabs in the dock system.

title: Marquee rectangle selection in timeline
description: Draw a rectangle to select multiple clips at once with live visual feedback during the drag.

title: Overlap resistance for clip dragging
description: Magnetic resistance when dragging clips over other clips prevents accidental overlaps, including linked audio clips.

title: Editable composition duration
description: Manually set the duration of compositions instead of relying on automatic calculation.

title: Fit button and playhead scrolling
description: Fit the entire timeline to the visible area and improved playhead auto-scrolling behavior.

title: Snap toggle button in timeline
description: Quick toggle for snapping behavior directly in the timeline toolbar.

title: Waveform and thumbnail toggles
description: Enable or disable waveform and thumbnail generation for clips to save resources on large projects.

title: Waveform rendering and audio clip detection
description: Waveforms now render on canvas for better performance with improved resolution, proper downsampling, and reliable audio file type detection.

title: Timeline drag and drop improvements
description: Audio files restricted to audio tracks, strict track type enforcement, proper drop zones, and null checks prevent crashes.

title: Real-time effect changes during playback
description: Effect and property changes now update in real-time during playback instead of requiring a pause.

title: Playhead rendering fixes
description: Playhead extends into the header row, moved to proper z-index level, and sticky header when scrolling.

title: Split all clips at playhead with C key
description: The C key shortcut now correctly splits all clips at the playhead position, including linked audio clips.

title: Export current frame reads from GPU
description: Frame export now properly reads pixel data from the GPU instead of producing blank images.

title: Context menus stay within viewport
description: Right-click context menus and dropdown menus no longer overflow outside the screen edges.

title: Zoom with Alt+scroll centers on playhead
description: Zooming the timeline with Alt+scroll now centers on the playhead position for more intuitive navigation.

title: Vertical scrolling in timeline
description: Use the mouse wheel to scroll the timeline vertically, with Shift+scroll for horizontal scrolling.

title: Grey accent color and style refresh
description: Accent color changed from blue to grey across the app, keeping blue highlights only in the timeline.

title: Timeline and engine performance optimizations
description: Optimized Zustand store selectors, timeline keyframe lookups with memoized sets, and WebGPU engine hooks for smoother editing.

title: Split stores and engine into focused modules
description: timelineStore split into focused Zustand slices and WebGPUEngine split into focused modules for better maintainability.

title: Right-click waveform generation for audio clips
description: Generate waveforms on demand by right-clicking audio clips in the timeline.

title: GPU-based mask feather with quality slider
description: Mask feather now uses GPU blur with a 1-100 quality slider for smooth, real-time feathering.

title: Effect keyframes and interpolation
description: Effect parameters now support keyframe animation with interpolation during playback and display in the timeline.

title: GPU-based effects rendering pipeline
description: Effects are now rendered on the GPU via WebGPU, with per-clip effects arrays and proper layer propagation.

title: Right-click reset to default for sliders
description: Right-click any slider or effect parameter to instantly reset it to its default value.

title: After Effects-style mask system
description: Add, subtract, and edit shape masks on clips with drag-to-draw tools, vertex editing, Shift+drag handle scaling, and feather support.

title: Mask vertex and bezier handle editing
description: Fixed Shift+drag for bezier handles, vertex position reads, and dynamic Shift key detection during drags.

title: Full 3D rotation with perspective
description: Clips now support X, Y, and Z axis rotation with perspective projection and correct aspect ratio.

title: Edit mode drag and bounding box calculation
description: Fixed inverted drag axes, position scaling, and bounding box calculations in the canvas edit mode.

title: Persist project state across page refresh
description: Your project is automatically saved to IndexedDB and restored when you reload the page.

title: Composition settings dialog
description: Configure composition resolution and settings directly from the Media panel.

title: Export current frame and custom resolution
description: Export a single frame or choose a custom resolution in the export panel.

title: Real-time preview while dragging clips
description: The preview now updates live as you drag clips across the timeline.

title: Clip drag and trim mouse handling
description: Fixed mouseup not releasing clips during drag/trim operations.

title: Playhead snap to clip edges and keyframes
description: Playhead now snaps to clip start/end positions in addition to keyframes.

title: Keyframe track alignment in timeline
description: Fixed vertical alignment of keyframe diamonds, property labels, and track rows in the timeline.

title: Reverse playback for video clips
description: Play video clips in reverse with frame-by-frame seeking and mirrored keyframes.

title: Timeline zoom sync effect
description: Fixed zoom calculation using direct zoom value instead of pixelToTime conversion.

title: Composition tabs in timeline toolbar
description: Switch between compositions via After Effects-style tabs in the timeline, with drag-to-reorder and hold-to-drag support.

title: Playhead snap to keyframes with Shift
description: Hold Shift while dragging the playhead to snap it to nearby keyframes.

title: Keyframe animation system for clip properties
description: Animate position, scale, rotation, and opacity over time with keyframes on the timeline.

title: All 37 After Effects blend modes
description: Complete set of blend modes matching After Effects. Cycle through them with Shift+/- on the selected clip.

title: Proxy storage with File System Access API
description: Choose a local folder for proxy file storage with a folder picker on first proxy generation.

title: Clip cutter and right-click context menu
description: Press C to cut clips at the playhead and use right-click for clip actions.

title: GPU-accelerated proxy generation and playback
description: Generate proxy frames using GPU acceleration with partial playback during generation and seamless timeline integration.

title: Nested composition playback
description: Play nested compositions with thumbnails, proper clip storage, and layer updates.

title: Composition-based timeline workflow
description: Each composition has its own timeline data. Double-click a comp to open it, with drag support from Media panel.

title: RAM Preview for instant scrubbing
description: After Effects-style RAM Preview caches rendered frames to GPU textures for instant scrubbing, rendering outward from the playhead.

title: Optimized video playback performance
description: Video playback uses requestVideoFrameCallback, early return fast paths, and capped render rate for smoother performance.

title: Drag preview with actual video duration
description: Dragging clips onto the timeline shows a dashed preview with the real video duration, loading in background.

title: Solo and mute buttons for tracks
description: Solo or mute individual video and audio tracks, with non-solo tracks visually dimmed.

title: Export panel with In/Out markers and loop playback
description: Full export panel with In/Out range markers, loop playback toggle, loading preview, and video encoding.

title: Global undo/redo system
description: Undo and redo any action with Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Shift+Z.

title: Edit mode with bounding boxes and layer dragging
description: Visual bounding boxes in the preview with drag-to-move layer positioning.

title: Hold-to-drag dock tab system
description: Hold mouse 500ms on a dock tab to initiate drag with glow animation.

title: Clip properties panel with transforms
description: Individual transform controls (position, scale, rotation, opacity) for each clip.

title: Audio track support and playback sync
description: Dedicated audio tracks with automatic creation, media type restrictions, and synced audio playback.

title: Frame caching for smooth scrubbing
description: Decoded video frames are cached for instant scrubbing without re-decode delays.

title: Blend modes shader type mismatch
description: Fixed blend modes not working due to u32 vs float type mismatch in shaders.

title: Track ordering for new clips
description: New video tracks are created at the top and audio tracks at the bottom.

title: Video aspect ratio in preview
description: Preview now maintains correct video aspect ratio with minimum panel sizes.

title: Delete key removes selected clip
description: Press Delete to remove the currently selected clip from the timeline.

title: Initial project setup
description: WebVJ Mixer application with WebGPU rendering engine, timeline editor, and dock panel system.
